alert.note: Alert for Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 08 at 3:22PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Camden and south central Glynn Counties through 345 PM EDT... At 322 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles southwest of Brunswick. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Wind gusts 40 to 50 mph and minor flooding due to heavy rainfall. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor flooding due to heavy rainfall is possible. Locations impacted include... Dover Bluff. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Camden; Coastal Glynn; Inland Camden
